title: Los Angeles Minimum-Wage Workers To Get A Raise
teaser: In a vote of 14-1, the Los Angeles City Council voted Tuesday to increase the city's minimum wage from $9 to $15 an hour by 2020. More than 40 percent of the workforce earns less than the hourly wage.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
